Title: Rendering presence within IBM Lotus Connections using Microsoft OCS Name Control
Description: This project documents and demonstrates using the Microsoft Communicator clients name control, how to provide presence awareness within a IBM Lotus Connections iWidget and Business card.
HomeWiki:
Rendering presence within IBM Lotus Connections using the Microsoft Office Communicator's Name Control
This project documents and demonstrates using the Microsoft Communicator clients name control, how to provide presence awareness within a IBM Lotus Connections iWidget and Business card.
This article and sample code demonstrates using the Microsoft Office Communicator's Name Control to display Microsoft OCS Presence within an IBM Lotus Connections iWidget, and the Lotus Connections business card.

This project contains documentation and sample code.

A video of the results can be seen here http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=niSkk6_aLx4

People who found this project useful, may also find this related project helpful http://iwidgetpresence.codeplex.com
